snippet.title: HOOK LINE & SNIPER | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Hook Line & Sniper on Steam now !! 🐟 : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3143190/Hook_Line_and_Sniper/

===============================================

You are a fish.

Armed with your grappling hook-equipped sniper rifle, go on the ultimate krilling spree in Hook Line & Sniper!
In this fast-paced arcade shooter, rack up points by mastering your arsenal and maximizing your style. Battle foes in and above the sea, show no mercy, and prove who’s the REAL apex predator!

#indiegamedev #indiegame
